title: Millennium Wellness
description: Millennium Wellness offers acupuncture, massage therapy and nutritional supplements in Cedaredge, CO. New patients welcome.
sitename: Millennium Wellness | Acupuncture in Cedaredge, CO
cleaned_text: Millennium Wellness Christin Hawbaker, L.Ac., CMT Acupuncturist ~ Herbalist ~ Massage Therapist Tim Hawbaker, L.Ac., FNP Acupuncturist ~ Herbalist ~ Nurse Practitioner "We treat the root of the problem, not just the symptoms." Welcome to Millennium Wellness located in beautiful Cedaredge, CO. We are dedicated to providing compassionate, complementary healthcare to Cedaredge and other Delta County and Colorado Western Slope communities. We provide the following services: - Acupuncture - Massage Therapy - Ozone Therapy / Prolozone Injections - Nutritional Supplements For Adults And Children - Chinese Herbal Medicine, Homeopathy , Essential Oils - Natural & Organic Products For Your Home And Family
